text: "Man of Steel" is a 1984 song by country singer Hank Williams Jr. and is the title track from his 36th studio album Man of Steel. It went to number 3 on the Billboard Hot Country songs chart and number 4 on Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. The shorter version appears on his greatest hits album Hank Williams Jr.'s Greatest Hits, Vol. 2. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs
title: Man of Steel (Hank Williams Jr. song)
